snippet.title: Dragonium Adventure | Steam Next Fest 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Fight and battle your way through the world of Akinori in this strategic turn-based RPG! Defeat powerful enemies, complete the intriguing story mode, improve your character, unlock new abilities and enter the fray in online multiplayer!
Discover new fighting techniques, new enemies and characters, new game modes and mechanics, an intriguing plot and a great mystery to solve!

Dragonium Adventure will make its debut with a SPECIAL FREE DEMO version during the Steam Next Fest in February 2024, in which it will be possible to try the first 5 levels and a small taste of Rush Mode!

The full game will be released on Steam by the end of 2024 and on Google Play Store in the future. To find out the official launch date, keep following us!
